hasDitaContent.@value: Both fingolimod and thalidomide can increase the risk of bradycardia.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  fingolimod  and  thalidomide  can increase the risk of bradycardia.

hasDitaContent.@value: Typhoid vaccine, oral is predicted to increase the risk of generalised infection (possibly life-threatening) when given with fingolimod. Public Health England advises avoid (refer to Green Book).
